data.context: My vision has become blurry, and I've lost a lot of weight despite eating normally.
I've been feeling confused lately and my skin looks yellowish.
I get panic attacks where my heart races and I feel like I can't breathe.
Sometimes, I wake up in the middle of the night wheezing and coughing.
There are scaly red patches on my elbows and scalp that itch a lot.
I feel tired all the time and my legs and ankles are swollen.
It hurts to breathe deeply and I feel exhausted just walking a few steps.
I feel tired all the time and my legs and ankles are swollen.
My skin gets thick and silvery in certain spots and is hard to treat.
I get short of breath easily and my skin looks paler than usual.
I feel tired all the time and my legs and ankles are swollen.
There are scaly red patches on my elbows and scalp that itch a lot.
It hurts to breathe deeply and I feel exhausted just walking a few steps.
My cough has been lasting for weeks and I bring up a lot of mucus.
There's facial pain and pressure, especially when I bend forward.
I often feel cold and tired, and my skin is very dry.
There's a wheezing sound when I breathe and my chest feels tight.
I get a burning pain in my stomach, especially when I'm hungry.
Sometimes I blank out for a few seconds and don't remember what happened.
I have trouble hearing and a feeling of fullness in one ear.
I get a burning pain in my stomach, especially when I'm hungry.
I get rashes that flare up with certain soaps and detergents.
It burns when I urinate and I feel like I have to go all the time.
I constantly feel nervous and have trouble concentrating on anything.
The discomfort gets better after eating or taking antacids.
My skin is red, itchy, and has started to flake off.
There are scaly red patches on my elbows and scalp that itch a lot.
I constantly feel nervous and have trouble concentrating on anything.
My skin gets thick and silvery in certain spots and is hard to treat.
My urine smells strange and looks cloudy.
I feel tired all the time, even after a full night's sleep, and sometimes I feel dizzy.
I've been losing weight rapidly and my hands tremble.
I feel tired all the time, even after a full night's sleep, and sometimes I feel dizzy.
My urine smells strange and looks cloudy.
I have trouble sleeping and feel tired and worthless all the time.
I'm gaining weight even though I haven't changed my eating habits.
I get rashes that flare up with certain soaps and detergents.
I've been coughing up blood and losing weight without trying.

I get short of breath easily and my skin looks paler than usual.

Sometimes, I wake up in the middle of the night wheezing and coughing.
My cough has been lasting for weeks and I bring up a lot of mucus.
Sometimes I blank out for a few seconds and don't remember what happened.
It hurts to breathe deeply and I feel exhausted just walking a few steps.
I've had diarrhea and vomiting for two days, along with stomach cramps.
I've lost interest in things I used to enjoy and feel hopeless most days.
I've had multiple seizures where I lose consciousness and shake uncontrollably.
My ear hurts and I've had some fluid draining from it.
